Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.binding

Class Summary
BeanBinder<T> A property binder that can convert a whole bean from / to a set of properties
BeanCollectionBinder<T> A binder for collections of beans
CustomBeanUtilsBean Customized bean utils in order to check if a mapped property refers to an array or single value
DataBinder<T> Has the capacity to read/store values from/to an object
DataBinderHelper Helper class for data binders
MapBean Map class implementing the DynaBean interface
MapBinder<K,V> A binder for maps
PropertyBinder<T> A property binder for simple properties
SimpleCollectionBinder<T> A binder for collections of a single type
 

Exception Summary
BindingException An exception while performing databinding
PropertyException An exception while reading / writing properties
